comment: Absolutely terrible.  Couldn't explain anything coherently.  Took up homework every week, then at the end of the semester realized that he had lost over half of them.  If I hadn't already taken Calculus in high school, I wouldn't have a chance at passing.

Horrible. He threatened to kick students out of the class we paid for if we didn't show up with our text books.He would also ramble on during lessons on subjects that had nothing to do with Math.DON'T TAKE THIS POOR EXCUSE FOR A TEACHER.
I failed with him. I took the class with Fadyn and got an A and a better appreciation for Math.
does not explain anything well at all.
